attributes.action: Amnesty for overstayer to work with British Growers due to Covid19
attributes.additional_details:
This will the help the Economic and stop food waste 
and the Government can do a review on the visas
attributes.background: To give overstayer a temporary visas to help the British Growers with their fruits and vegetables due to the Covid 19

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions calling for similar actions:

Home Office to offer one year visa extensions without applications being made.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310387

Amnesty for UK undocumented immigrants in this COVID-19 World pandemic: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312998

Create an earned amnesty route for migrants without leave to remain: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301696

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
